Description:
Location Location and Neat as a Pin!
Perfectly positioned for first home buyers, investors, downsizers or buyer alike, boasting an abundance of natural light this two bedroom unit will tick many boxes.
Enviably set off the Service Road and at the rear of the complex, you will enjoy the privacy as well as the abundance of conveniences at your fingertips.
This exciting opportunity offers a spacious and light drenched living and dining area, 2 bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom with separate toilet and a nicely updated kitchen which leads out to the private paved entertaining area which rounds out this fantastic low maintenance package!
Additional features include: split system, neutral colour pallet, abundance of natural light, abundance of storage, immaculate condition, single carport and paved entertaining area.
You're close to everything Belmont has to offer, in close proximity to the High Street's shopping strip extending many major amenities, including - but definitely not limited to - cafes, health clinics, shops, restaurants, Public transport at your doorstep, schools for all ages, the Geelong CBD and Surf Coast are very easily accessible.
Opportunities like this don't last, inspect today and secure this amazing opportunity!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 4/86 Settlement Road, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2015 and 40 other 2 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER OFFER!
With space to breathe at the front of the complex and being taken care of by a single owner occupier for many years 1/19 Bieske is a great no fuss, low maintenance dwelling that will impress downsizers, young couples and investors alike.
Featuring a spacious kitchen area with quality Asko dishwasher, pantry and ample cupboard space meal preparation will be a breeze. Separate toilet to bathroom and split system units in both the living area and main bedroom are nice features. The private courtyard at the rear of the property has a charming range of greenery and the lock up garage can also be accessed from here.
With close proximity to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and only walking distance to Heyers Rd Shops, local Medical Centre, Grovedale West Primary and Secondary College, here is a great unit that demands a private inspection today!
Insights: 1/19 Bieske Road, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 32 other 2 bedroom unit in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Family Entertainer!
A desirable Court location is just the beginning for this immaculately presented family home set on a 658m2 (approx) rear North facing allotment. The home will impress with a clever blend of functionality and charm and has been designed to maximise natural light throughout the home. Only minutes from Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Marshall Train Station, local schools and sporting fields and only a 5 minute drive to Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and Geelong ring road this home perfectly combines convenience and lifestyle.
The unassuming facade and neat front garden give only a hint of what is to come. Upon entry you instantly have a sense of space and natural light and cant help but be drawn into this inviting home featuring. The large front living area is an inviting space with views out to a front garden and rear entertaining area. The spacious master bedroom will impress and features bay windows, walk-in robe and stylishly renovated en-suite featuring over-sized shower, double vanity and toilet.
The heart of the home is a generous open plan space incorporating lounge, dining area and stunning kitchen featuring Fisher & Paykel wall oven & gas cook top with range-hood, Bosch dishwasher and walk-in pantry. To the rear of the home is yet another generous living area perfect as games room, cinema room or kids retreat, and a private study which could also double as a nursery. From here a hallway leads to three spacious bedrooms all with built-in robes and the tastefully renovated central bathroom featuring stunning floor and wall tiles, free-standing glass shower screen, vanity and luxurious free standing bath. There is also a separate toilet and functional laundry with external access, and an abundance of storage.
From the centre of the home a sliding door leads out to the impressive alfresco area which is completely enclosed and features timber deck flooring and over-head ceiling fan, this expansive area looks out to the manicured rear garden and is perfect for BBQs and entertaining all year round. This unique and clever space has been designed to include a rear carport leading from the immaculate remote double garage with convenient rear roller door access, perfect for a boat, caravan or trailer. There is also a powered work shop at the rear of the backyard.
Stunningly renovated with attention to detail and quality, spacious throughout and with desirable features including open plan design with 3 living areas, renovated bathroom & en-suite, gas ducted heating, 2 X reverse cycle AC, bedroom ceiling fans, down lights, quality fixtures & flooring coverings throughout this impressive home is a must see for a growing family.
Insights: 17 Hollows Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 77 other 4 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

North Facing Block Of 667sqm
Located in one of Hightons most sought after locations, this large allotment of 667m2 (approx) is prime for you to build your dream family home.
Minutes from some of the best schools in the region, Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza, Epworth Hospital, Deakin University, Leisurelink Aquatic Centre and easy access to the Ring Road which will have you in Melbourne in under an hour & on the surf coast in 20 minutes.
Having been titled already, you are able to start building straight away (STCA).
Your dream home awaits..

Description:
Looking for a good sized block at great value, this 427m2 titled block is the one for you.
Whether you are a first home owner, down sizer or seasoned investor, this is a perfect opportunity for your next step.
The enviable north west facing block has a generous 14m frontage and offers so many build designs compared with other narrower lots currently available.
Located in the Quay 2 Estate, you're only minutes drive to Torquay's best beaches, famous surf shopping precinct and walking distance to both primary & secondary schools, skate park & recreation facilities, community centre & Torquay North shopping precinct.

Description:
CENTRAL TORQUAY - REMOVE, RENOVATE, RENT OR HOLIDAY!! - Private Inspections Welcome
An opportunity exists for the investor, developer, home buyer or holiday maker to purchase a large home positioned on a 697m2 (approx.) allotment in a quiet court location with a reserve only metres away.
This spacious split level, two storey home provides plenty of accommodation for the biggest of families comprising 6 bedrooms inclusive of built in robes, open plan kitchen with dining and huge living area, a second living / rumpus room includes a further partial kitchen and laundry, two bathrooms the main is complete with spa bath. Featuring a front yard with plenty of space for the kids to play and paved outdoor entertaining area for entertaining guests, timber floors, Baltic pine staircase, electric heating, split system heating and cooling in the main living, solar power (3kw system) and rear shed for storage.
Ideally positioned in a tightly held area of Old Torquay, within minutes walk to local schools, Deep Creek Reserve, shops, public transport, beach and medical facilities and currently being used as a holiday rental. This residence offers plenty of scope for further development (STCA), call now to arrange your inspection today!!
Insights: 6 Centre Court, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Meander to Riverside Life
This quality home is solid, low maintenance and positioned in a super quiet street just moments to the river.
Lovingly enjoyed by the same family since new, the time has come to pass on this feature filled property. Its layout is family friendly with a light and bright open plan living zone. This space is perfect for making the most of north facing living and outdoor entertaining; while the expansive kitchen, with copious storage and workspace, makes everyday living so easy.
The master bedroom (with en-suite and walk in robe) adjoins a second living space. This is an ideal parents retreat and a relaxing space to unwind. Three additional bedrooms are located towards the rear of the home and all have built in robes. A generously sized bathroom caters for family life, as does the ample storage throughout.
The 687sqm (approx) sunny and private garden is fully fenced and includes a fernery, shed, solar panels and rainwater storage. The lawns are invitingly spacious and the established trees and easy care landscaping mean more time for playing and gently pottering in the garden.
River walks, fishing and kayaking are so effortlessly within reach. A short meander through leafy reserves will see you enjoying riverside life in minutes. Barwon Heads for shopping, cafes, ocean beaches and more is so accessible too, as is the popular local primary school, golf course, parks and playgrounds.
Slow down, settle in and enjoy everything that makes the Bellarine lifestyle so special. This is a haven you can come home to and let peace, sunshine and serenity envelope you.
Insights: 46 Newbay Close, Barwon Heads VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Barwon Heads have recently been sold.

Description:
Opportunity Awaits
A fantastic opportunity for a first home buyer looking to enter the marketplace, downsized, or even an investor looking to expand their portfolio. Only moments from the newly expanded Waurn Ponds shopping complex and everything high street has to offer. All your public transport needs right outside your doorstep and local schools within walking distance.
Upon entry to the home, you are welcomed by the formal lounge room offering a gas heater and flowing through to the dining and kitchen area. Including gas cooking and ample bench space. The two spacious bedrooms provide built-in robes and utilize the central bathroom.
Outdoors provides a spacious courtyard with a garden shed and a remote single lock-up garage. Added extras include a shared storeroom. Call today for more information.

Description:
Outstanding Opportunity (Cnr Block) with Plenty of Potential (730m2)
In a coveted family neighborhood with easy access to local schools, public transport & shops, this classic brick home offers comfortable family living with outstanding future potential. This solid well planned home features 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, main with ensuite, plus study, ample storage, comfortable lounge with OFP, central kitchen, formal dining, 2nd living area and large laundry. Outside is a double garage, garden shed, and two driveways ideal for osp, caravan or boat all on a large corner allotment of 730m2 approx. Close to walking and riding tracks along the Waurn Ponds Creek, a short drive to High Street and Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, library, Leisure Link and the beaches of the surf coast or Melbourne via the ring road. Perfect first home, family home or rock solid investment in a proven growth suburb.
Insights: 16 Hereford Drive, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Turnkey Opportunity on Huge Block
This fully renovated & spacious family home will be sure to impress. Ideally located close to all of Belmonts main amenities including Highton Village shopping strip, Roslyn Primary School, Belmont High School and much more.
The home boasts four spacious bedrooms with built in robes, a large master with walk in robe and full ensuite, a formal lounge area that flows gently to a formal dining and study nook. The open plan chefs kitchen with quality stainless steel cooking appliances and ample cupboard space makes up the central hub of the home that also overlooks an outdoor paved patio area.
Other quality features include; lock up garage with drive through access, air-conditioning in the master bedroom and in living area, storage shed plus more.
Call us today for further details and inspection arrangements.

Description:
Fantastic Family Living - Central Location
Occupying a generous allotment of approximately 623 square metres with the bonus of a separate bungalow, this well maintained family home features a series of versatile living zones. These include two internal living rooms with an adjoining study/rumpus. For sheer size and having many features of note this wonderful home cannot be looked passed.
Giving everyone privacy and space, the main ensuite bedroom featuring walk in robe is set well apart from the remaining two bedrooms and family bathroom. The generously sized kitchen features a pantry, oven and separate gas stove top. Temperature control is of ease in the house with numerous options including split systems, ducted heating, gas wall heater and ceiling fans in the bedrooms. A pergola-covered patio looks onto a sizeable rear garden enticing the kids to play outside. The carport is easily accessible at the front of the property while a lock up carport space and single lock up garage/workshop sit behind. Further to this is the bungalow and garden shed.
Enjoy as is and in your own time breathe new life into the home with a full contemporary renovation. An appealing option for buyers with vision, all the ingredients needed for a successful recipe for the future are right here in this fantastic location near schools, bus services, Waurn Ponds shopping Centre, Epworth hospital, Deakin University, Marshall & Waurn Ponds train stations, Central Geelong and the Surf Coast.

Description:
Space, Lifestyle and Convenience
A fantastic opportunity awaits the astute purchaser looking for a stunning residence with spotless presentation and a flexible floor plan. Positioned in the heart of old Grovedale and close to all your daily essentials including the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Peter St shops, Grovedale West Primary School and Grovedale Secondary College, Nazareth Primary School, public transport and lots more. Once inside you will instantly appreciate the home's smart design and spaciousness. Comprising of 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living areas, all bedrooms consist of BIR's and the main bedroom is complete with ensuite. The kitchen features stainless appliances including gas cooktop and ample storage, the home has a gas heater in the formal lounge and split system in the living area with pitched ceilings. Recently updated throughout, all the hard work has been done. Sitting on approximately 665sqm with double garage, plenty of extra off-street parking and room for the kids to ride their bikes plus a grassed backyard. This Grovedale gem is perfect for all range of buyers including first homebuyers looking to enter today's market, investors looking to expand their portfolios and families looking for that spacious af-fordable easy living.

Description:
Contemporary family living.
Located in the prestigious Molesworth Drive, a quiet no-through road and surrounded by quality residences, this 12 year old family home in the sought after Glastonbury Estate is sure to impress. Just a short stroll to Waurn Ponds Shopping mecca, Leisure Link and with great access to the Ring Road you won't be able to top this one on location.
Consisting of four generous bedrooms, three separate living areas and a study, not to mention the expansive open plan kitchen, living and dining area which seamlessly flows out onto the north facing entertaining deck and grassed backyard. This quality family property truly provides something for each member of your family. The master suit is one to dream about in size. Including its own ensuite and walk in robe, this bedroom needs to be inspected to grasp the grandeur. The remaining bedrooms are complete with their own built in robes and are all serviced by the central bathroom and separate toilet.
Key features include evaporative cooling, ducted heating, plantation shutters, walk in pantry and a double car garage with internal access. This property is sure to excite those keen to secure their new family home.

Description:
Immaculate modern living
The presentation of this property is truly outstanding. Sparkling clean and in immaculate condition, you won't need to do anything except move in and enjoy all this location offers. Minutes to the local shopping centre and primary school, walking distance to parkland and public transport and only 15 minutes to Geelong CBD and coastal areas this property offers low maintenance living in a very convenient position.
Comprising a central hallway, formal lounge/sitting area, open plan kitchen/dining/family with stainless steel appliances including gas cooktop, fanforced oven and dishwasher. This area has plenty of natural light, with west facing windows overlooking the rear yard and opens out through sliding doors to the undercover entertaining area. There four bedrooms - master with walk in robe and ensuite, the remaining three each have built in robes. The main bathroom provides a separate bath and shower and separate toilet.
Extras include ducted heating throughout, reverse cycle AC, gas boosted solar hot water, large garden shed and water tank. Outdoors is a very impressive and perfectly manicured lawn, landscaped gardens and a remote controlled double garage with internal house access plus a rear roller door to the back yard. Allotment approximately 399sqm.
Certain to suit first home buyers, couples, downsizers and investors, with an estimated rental income of $400 per week. Step inside this home and your search is sure to be over.
Please note, all information is provided by third parties. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the accuracy of information relating to properties. Eastwood Andrews will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information supplied.

Description:
FAMILY HOME ON A LARGE SUNNY BLOCK
This as new modern family home offers effortless family living with an abundance of natural light situated on a large 572m2 (approx.) block of land.
Located in the popular Zeally Sands Estate with a beautiful entrance this residence consists of 4 bedrooms all with BIRs, master with dual vanities and WIR and a centrally located family bathroom. Open plan kitchen / dining and living which flow seamlessly onto a north facing undercover decked entertaining area and rear yard, a second living area for the family to retreat and separate study area.
Other features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2.7m ceilings, 900mm cook-top, stone bench tops, full and partial blinds and double lock up garage with internal access. With low-maintenance, easy care gardens plus side access for the caravan, boat or trailer. Dont miss this fantastic opportunity to secure a family home or investment property located in close proximity to Surf Coast Secondary College, Torquay Coast Primary school, playground, childcare centre, Dunes shopping complex and local sporting reserves plus only minutes to Whites beach and The Sands Golf Course. Dont delay your inspection, call us today!!

Description:
"The Best Views on The Esplanade"
Front row dress circle position across the road from one of Australias premier beach locations, this master-built property is centrally located between Old Torquay & the new Torquay North. This unique opportunity will be a popular choice, with a flexible & versatile design that includes self-contained living & world-class ocean views guaranteed from both levels. This well-positioned property near Torquays restaurant precinct will appeal to many, & families will enjoy safe swimming & surfing at protected Fisherman's Beach.
The ground level offers open plan living, kitchen & dining, where all eyes are firmly transfixed on the deep blue sea views, stretching from Zeally Bay to Cape Schanck. Sliding doors open to a covered front deck & immaculate lawn, shaded by an iconic Moonah Tree. There are few better places to cook & enjoy meals than in this kitchen, with views that will inspire your inner chef, aided by Westinghouse appliances (wall oven/gas hob/DW), walk-in pantry & ample cupboard space.
At the rear is a master suite with westerly garden aspect, WIR, en suite & powder room, plus a fully fitted home office & laundry.
The timber staircase features an electronic Stairlift for optimal full use of the home, leading to the top level where a large living room with gas log fire & SSAC provides the ultimate location to appreciate vast sea views. Ships sailing through the Heads, glorious sunrises & a daily procession of activity is on show from this elevated position, with a roomy covered deck that will accommodate the family & visitors. A convenient kitchenette further demonstrates the desirability of this home as an ideal permanent downsizer, luxury beach home or ideal investment.
Two additional spacious bedrooms with BIRs & a central main bathroom service the upper level, overlooking the neat back garden. An RC double lock up carport leads to a rear garage/workshop, complete with plumbing & WC, & 1,100L water tank.
Dont miss this opportunity to secure your own piece of prime real estate on the best residential strip in Torquay. Inspection by appointment only.

Address: 24-26 Grange Park Drive Waurn Ponds VIC 3216
Description:
Spacious family living on 1731m2.
Standing proudly on 1,731m2 of prime residential land, this beautiful, Tuscany inspired home offers space, privacy, and convenience in Waurn Ponds most exclusive Estate. Comprising 5 spacious bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 living areas, a massive alfresco and garaging for 4 cars, this property certainly caters to the large family that wants no compromise on space. On entry, this imposing home is sure to impress, with 9ft ceilings, decorative bulkheads, and opulence throughout.
The spacious kitchen features stone benches, chef-style 900mm oven and cooktop, dishwasher and walk-in pantry. The open plan kitchen overlooks the living and dining area and provides a great space to entertain guests by opening out to a paved undercover alfresco area and adjoining open trellis area with charming fire pit.
The main living room is light-filled and features a beautiful open fireplace, great for winter family time. To the rear of the home, a second large living area makes the perfect place for a teenagers retreat or a rumpus room.
Accommodation is very well appointed and is made up of a large master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite, 2 more bedrooms with walk-in robes and another 2 with built-in robes. Bedrooms 2-5 are serviced by a large central bathroom with double vanity, spa bath, and separate toilet. A 3rd bathroom adjoins the Laundry and offers a vanity, shower, and toilet great when entertaining.
Outside you will find a huge north-facing backyard with established trees, a veggie garden with four 3m x 3m raised garden beds and a large grassed area that could be the perfect spot for a pool.
Notable features include:
- Ducted heating.
- Split system air conditioning.
- Ducted vacuum.
- Great storage.
- 4 car garage with rear roller door.
Located just a short drive from Waurn Ponds shopping center, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Geelong CBD, Geelong Ring Road and within walking distance to Waurn Ponds train station, this property is the perfect blend of space and convenience. Enquire today!
To book your private inspection please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.

Description:
Serene, Native Oasis In Riverend Locale
Due to the current Global Health Pandemic, we are providing two alternatives for you to view any of our current listings.
Arrangements can still be made for a private viewing and we are also offering a Live Stream Open Home for you to view via Instagram at a specified time.
There will be no traditional Open Homes until further notice.
Please contact the listing agents to discuss either of the above options and/or to learn when the Live Stream is scheduled.
follow peta_bellarineproperty
follow leviturnerbellarineproperty
The Feel:
Prioritising, serenity and peace in a rustic native setting, this established 3 bedroom home in a popular riverend pocket promotes an enviable coastal lifestyle. Direct access to the adjacent reserve and parklands, a 3 minute walk to the Barwon River and 5 minutes to the bustling village centre completing this idyllic way of life.
The Facts:
-Brightly lit OP kitchen, living and dining to the rear
-Timber cabinetry, 900mm gas cooktop and WIP
-Entire living zone overlooks outdoor deck and gardens
-The spacious deck is perfect for entertaining
-Attractive, hardwood timber floors throughout
-Veggie gardens, lush green lawn and low maintenance native garden
-Adjacent to open reserve, forever ensuring privacy
-No neighbours to the west boundary at present
-Master Suite complete with WIR and ensuite bathroom
-Private study with potential 4th BR conversion
-2 further BRs are spacious in size with BIRs
-Main bathroom with separate W.C and laundry
-Hydronic heating and R/C air conditioning
-Oversized, DLUG with rear roller access, side gate entry
-Crisp white Roman Blinds
-New pure wool carpets
-Photovoltaic system = low electricity bills
-LED lighting throughout
The Owner Loves.
We love the peace and serenity of this location. Having no neighbours either side and direct access to the parklands behind us gives us privacy, while allowing us to take walks through to the river. The short distance to the village centre means we go for bike rides for our morning coffee, enjoying a healthy active lifestyle. The home itself is so functional and has been so easy to live in.

Description:
Quality Townhouse Living in Idyllic Location
This is meticulous, quality townhouse living right in the heart of Barwon Heads. Enjoy the simplicity of a single level home that has been designed to capture sunlight and maximise your down time.
A highlight here is the spacious open plan living that flows seamlessly to outdoor entertaining on a sunny and private deck. The extensive kitchen features gas cooking; stainless appliances; caesarstone bench tops; and plentiful work and storage space to make hosting family and friends a breeze. Three generous bedrooms all include built in robes; the master is king sized with his and hers robes and a stylish en-suite with twin vanities and luxurious rainwater showerhead. Other features include a family bathroom with designer style bathtub; ample storage throughout; a garage with internal access and a laundry. The tranquil neutral decor will appeal to everyone, as will the stunning Victorian ash timber floors.
Outdoors the compact garden is very easy care leaving lots of time to enjoy relaxing on the deck or making the most of the nearby river, parks and beach. Rainwater storage tanks are a welcome bonus as is the low maintenance exterior.
Located in a quiet pocket away from the busyness yet only a short walk to boutique eating and shopping, numerous reserves and playgrounds, school and kinder, and Barwon River walkways and beaches. This home will be appreciated by anyone who is looking for the quintessential coastal lifestyle with lock and leave potential, or for that effortless holiday feeling all year round.
Call Candace Smith 0437 333 349 to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Grand Family Home In Convenient Location
Nestled on 707m2, this huge home has everything that a modern family requires. Perfectly positioned close to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Waurn Ponds Train Station and the M1 taking you to Melbourne in under an hour, ensuring a convenient lifestyle for now and into the future.
This family home is comprised of four large bedrooms, master with huge walk in robe and stylish ensuite showcasing a spa bath and over size shower. The three remaining bedrooms have built in robes and share a central bathroom and separate toilet. The open plan kitchen, dining and living area is vast and is the perfect place to entertain friends and family. The kitchen features quality stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar and loads of storage and bench space as well as access to the undercover alfresco.
Adding to the endless options and flexible floor plan of this stunning home is a further two large living spaces and a well-proportioned study. Other notable features include central heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum and remote double lock up garage with secure internal access.
Outside you will find manicured and low maintenance gardens as well as a beautiful pool for all the family to enjoy. Don't miss your opportunity to inspect this magnificent family home.
